post.body: ....and before you say it.. that's not a threat, that's a fucking promise Bitch boy...
...and before you say it... That's a promise asshole.
I'll introduce you to my two lawyers. SMITH AND WESSON, dick lick...
You might end up in a fucking body bag, but you are most welcome... I'll even let you throw the first punch... bitch.
Anytime you wanna come say something about my MOM TO MY FACE, you're more the welcome...
Be a man mother fucker marry the woman ....
Say g'nite to your live in whore asshole.
Find 'em, fuck 'em and forget them... only way to fly...
and will live that way for the rest my damn life.
Shows what you know about me.... Zero. Been fucked over, threw her ass in the street and very happily single...
so to speak....
Way I like it, I had an account 500 ppl following me, got tired of the bullshit and created a new account. Had to cull the herd...
Oh bite my crank... you liberal piece of shit... go fuck your little live in whore and have a nice day...
Meh... you don't scare me in the least...
Oh that's really fucking original... got a blonde little number and that's all you can say back to me?
So, enjoy... I won't mention her again...
anyhow, I have no interest in a fight... I said I wouldn't bug, and I haven't, I just unblocked her on AIM by mistake...
and to be clear. I'm a perfect asshole and don't you ever forget it motherfucker...
As long as it's not load. :-) Wait... .357?!?! WOW! Gun packing mamma! Woo Hoo! ;-P
Hehehe... take pictures... I wanna see ya bouncing off the walls... ;-P
Bouncing off the walls are we?
which I had the funds to trade... I got freakin' 35 bucks and some change in my checking account... :-/ I HATE rich ppl
which movie?
Two Words Bitch: FUCK YOU! You're stupid Indenity Politics is not going to work here. so, get the FUCK ON BITCH! #TCOT
heh

Stole the line from, I think the Jefferson, George Jefferson would say, I like my coffee hot Black and strong...
you know... milk or creamer in the coffee.
I like my coffee made the way I like my Women. HOT, WHITE AND STRONG! Woo hoo!
